description: It is good, crossfade feature is missing. And make blurrr more darker.

any other player would be much better
the ui looks weird and inconsistent, there's no cue splitting support, poor perfrmance, bad navigation etc

The UI is clean and visually appealing, definitely one of the better looking music players for Linux. I also appreciate that Resonance categorizes my music library by album artist, avoiding multiple entries for the same artist when adding songs featuring other artists. I want a simple music player that's nice to look at and I get that experience with Resonance.
summary: Simple music player with a stunning interface

description: I love Resonance. It has a beautiful and simple interface, built with gtk4 and libadwaita. The developer is also very active, quickly fixing bugs and working on features. Resonance also includes integration with Last.fm and Discord rich presence, which is a nice touch. It's still in early development, but it's already a fantastic music player that is user-friendly and features a beautiful interface.
summary: A Fantastic and Beautiful Music Player

description:
This is a quality option with a lot of potential down the road. Not barebones like Amberol, not a full-blown library manager like Rhythmbox. This finds a happy medium. Some alpha software bugs, but it works. It blows GNOME Music out of the water. 

Personally I need device syncing features and I prefer the nostalgic look/feel of Rhythmbox. If those don't apply to you then give it a try!
summary: Early build of a solid music player

description:
This player looks nice, but there's so many issues present that I can't use it.
- V.A. compilations are a mess, the album view shows the track artist from a random song while the track view and now playing shows album artist instead (???)
- Playing a track doesn't automatically start a queue, you have to create one manually
- The track info in the footer resizes to fit instead of cutting off; long titles will either be a super tiny font size or just disappear completely
- Albums do not automatically grab cover art from the folder if the songs themselves aren't tagged
- The volume slider is weird, I can't drag it (maxing out volume requires insane precision) and the way it follows my cursor on hover makes me feel like it's stuck?
- Very subjective, but the gradients are too aggressively saturated and the constant changing when playing cover art-less music is distracting. No separate dark/light themes.

This player is still very new, so I'm still hoping that it can get better.
summary: UI has potential, but plenty of issues

description:
This music player is visually appealing, but lacks reliability. The UI is constantly shifting and unpredictable, elements are often hidden unless hovered upon, and everything is riddled with bugs.

The effort made to create a GTK4 music player with blur and other eye candy is one that I've been following and while this shows the potential to become a great option, it is currently surpassed in usability by all its competitors.

I'll still be keeping an eye on this one.
after adding only 1k musics, the app using 3.2G memory to handle that and crashed.

https://github.com/nate-xyz/resonance/issues/60
https://github.com/nate-xyz/resonance/issues/32


This issue makes the app unusable, all tracks are loaded into RAM at once.
summary: Eat up all RAM, makes system freeze

description:
Modernes Design vielleicht etwas wenig an Einstellungen aber ich will ja Musik damit hören und kein DJ sein!!
Macht weiter so!

Es muy bonito, el diseño es el más bonito que he visto en reproductores de música. Está en desarrollo, pero la verdad es que no me ha dado grandes fallos. Me encanta que recoge toda la música que tengo y no tengo que andar buscándola
Вроде нелохо и красиво, но маленький глюк - при наведении курсора на альбом иконка становится просто непрозрачной белой, что ломает впечатление от общей эстетики
Если бы автоматически обновляло список музыки, было бы 5 звезд
summary: Красивый, удобный, но есть некоторые баги

description: You guys make Linux prettier with this player! Thank you

Красивое приложение с сохранением библиотеки в альфа версии и по этому авансом 5. Плеер заработал, но после добавления и сканирования папки с музыкой (более 30 000 файлов) при запуске выдаёт ошибку и не запускается.
